snippet: Thin places, where the distance between heaven and earth collapses, can relax us and transform us — or, more accurately, unmask us.
abstract: Eric Weiner travel article on 'thin places,' beguiling locales where the distance between heaven and earth collapses and the traveler can catch a glimpse of the divine or the transcendent; thin places jolt the voyager out of old ways of seeing the world, making travel magically transformative.
lead_paragraph: Thin places, where the distance between heaven and earth collapses, can relax us and transform us — or, more accurately, unmask us.
